name: Neko and Me
description:
Sam is on his road to Nagoya, Japan, and Neko. Journey them as they travel through 6 worlds(?) to this country, while in the midst of each objectives each world...more info on this story in-game.

Note: The only thing I found it compatible is the Windows and Android, as I only have them, so I'm not sure if it can works on Linux and Mac OS X. If it does, let me know.
